mapper.select: select SPCODE, SPNUMBER, OPER, OPERTIME, PHONE1, STATE, CORPPROP, WQYCODE, SPSTATUS, TYPE, AGENTCOUNT, DAYNUM, IVRCOUNT, FAXCOUNT, FEE, SAVING, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ASSIGNFLAG, LINKMAN, TEL, EMAIL, LOGO, NAME, RESERVE, SELLAREA, CONTACT1, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SERVICETYPE, MANUFACTUREAREA, ADDRESS from db_spbase where SPCODE = #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SPCODE, SPNUMBER, OPER, OPERTIME, PHONE1, STATE, CORPPROP, WQYCODE, SPSTATUS, TYPE, AGENTCOUNT, DAYNUM, IVRCOUNT, FAXCOUNT, FEE, SAVING, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ASSIGNFLAG, LINKMAN, TEL, EMAIL, LOGO, NAME, RESERVE, SELLAREA, CONTACT1, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SERVICETYPE, MANUFACTUREAREA, ADDRESS from db_spbase
mapper.sql: SPCODE , SPNUMBER , OPER , OPERTIME , PHONE1 , STATE , CORPPROP , WQYCODE , SPSTATUS , TYPE , AGENTCOUNT , DAYNUM , IVRCOUNT , FAXCOUNT , FEE , SAVING , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , ASSIGNFLAG , LINKMAN , TEL , EMAIL , LOGO , NAME , RESERVE , SELLAREA , CONTACT1 , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , SERVICETYPE , MANUFACTUREAREA , ADDRESS

SPCODE = #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SPNUMBER = #{spnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
PHONE1 = #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CORPPROP = #{corpprop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
WQYCODE = #{wqycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SPSTATUS = #{spstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
AGENTCOUNT = #{agentcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
DAYNUM = #{daynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
IVRCOUNT = #{ivrcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FAXCOUNT = #{faxcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SAVING = #{saving,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ASSIGNFLAG = #{assignflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
LINKMAN = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LOGO = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE = #{reserve,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SELLAREA = #{sellarea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CONTACT1 = #{contact1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SERVICETYPE = #{servicetype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
MANUFACTUREAREA = #{manufacturearea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

SPCODE = #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SPNUMBER = #{spnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
PHONE1 = #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
CORPPROP = #{corpprop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
WQYCODE = #{wqycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SPSTATUS = #{spstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
AGENTCOUNT = #{agentcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
DAYNUM = #{daynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
IVRCOUNT = #{ivrcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
FAXCOUNT = #{faxcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
SAVING = #{saving,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
ASSIGNFLAG = #{assignflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
LINKMAN = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
LOGO = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
RESERVE = #{reserve,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
SELLAREA = #{sellarea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
CONTACT1 = #{contact1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,

, 1=1
